snippet.title: Amazon.com: Chopin: 4 Ballades, Barcarolle in F Sharp Major ...
snippet.description:
* Amazon.com: Chopin: 4 Ballades, Barcarolle in F Sharp Major ...
www.amazon.com/Chopin-Ballades-Barcarolle-Sharp-Fantasy/... Cached
28 Reviews Krystian Zimerman's Chopin is big. He plays this music with a great dynamic range and huge contrasts, with little of the shading we love in Rubinstein's Chopin.
